attributes.action: RETURN THE RESPONSIBILITY FOR MEDICAL TRAINING TO THE ROYAL COLLEGES
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "RETURN THE RESPONSIBILITY FOR MEDICAL TRAINING TO THE ROYAL COLLEGES."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page12185.asp

Prime Minister's Office
